page.title: 14RUSHTON AIRFIELD & WARTIME
page.content: {MR.& MRS.LEONARD}LIVE AT ROSE COTTAGE, 300M. FROM THE AIRFIELD.THEY HAVE LIVED THERE FOR 30 YRS.MR.LEONARD WORKED AT THE AIRFIELD FOR OVER 30YRS AS AN ENGINEER.HE WAS A FRIEND OF{SIR {ALAN COBHAM.}THE AIRFIELD WAS BUILT BEFORE THE 2ND WORLD WAR.AT FIRST 20 PEOPLE WORKED THERE.LATER 1600 PEOPLE WORKED THERE. DURING THE WAR IT WAS USED FOR AIRBORNE TROOPS AND BEFORE D-DAY THERE WERE HUNDREDS OF GLIDERS -HANNIBALS & HORSAS - PACKED ON THE AIRFIELD.IT WAS ALSO USED BY S.O.E.(ESPIONAGE). AFTER THE WAR FLIGHT REFUELLING TOOK OVER UNDER{SIR {ALAN COBHAM}THERE WERE PARTIES EVERY YEAR FOR 600 CHILDREN HELD IN THE BIG HANGER WHICH STILL REMAINS.EVERY YEAR PEOPLE COME FROM ALL OVER THE COUNTRY & OVERSEAS TO A SERVIVE AT THE MEMORIAL. {GLEN,KERRY,EMMA,COLIN.
